messages.message:
@Brian note that all the prompts are independent from one another, we don’t have conversation memory feature (yet) so for the “how did you determine” question the model has no context.

@jordy.vlan do we need a clearer separation between the document metadata and the document content? It looks like the model here confused the two

Oh wow, this is quite interesting feedback. 
Hmm, the original implementation had it more clearly delineated, we should discuss this in more detail for future metadata as well.
I do think it is also an unfortunate reply from the model to mention it as text, rather than as metadata.
